name: Lawman Remastered [ name pending ]
description:
Try to work your way out of a western duel without letting your opponent know you have a gun with no bullets!

Use the mouse to select options and the arrow keys (or A and D) to move around

Lawman Remastered was made by a 3 person, expanding upon a short prototype also called Lawman?:
gensuta - Game Designer, Programmer
miles-logan - Game Designer, Narrative Designer, Audio Director, UI Artist
drewcaines - Game Designer, Background Artist
Carbon Dog  - Game Designer, Character Artist

BGM is The Good, The Bad, and The Ugly  theme song
